author: samisa
msg: Fixed AXIS2C-1183. Now it works with empty -lp or -tp without crashing

author: markt
msg: Fix 42934.   Change the order of events on context start so contextInitialized() event is fired before sessionDidActivate(). The spec isn't 100% clear on the required order but this seems more logical than the current behaviour.

author: yegor
msg: expose access to OEPlaceholderAtom  so that users can determine whether a shape represents ppt placeholder (date/time, footer or slide number)

author: yegor
msg: Fixed TextShape.resizeToFitText() to properly resize TextShape. See patch#45140
